languages.text: {n}Оптический аугмент Паскаля заливает багрянец, а динамик вокса разражается воем, полным негодования и боли.{/n} "Фиксирую святотатственную ересь, рожденную спесивым скудоумием мирян! Завет "Да не попусти лжепророка к таинствам Омниссии" — попран! Завет "Не вознеси хулу на Него, сотворив небрежение в обслуживании" — попран!" {n}Вой переходит в задушенный злобный хрип:{/n} "Какой мерзавец придумал воскуривать вместо благовоний священные смазочные масла?!"

{n}Pasqal's optical visor fills with deep red, and his vox-speaker erupts into a howl of pained fury:{/n} "I am registering heretical sacrilege born from the stupidity of self-entitled laity! The commandment 'Allow not a false prophet to touch upon the mysteries of the Omnissiah' has been violated! The commandment 'Offend not the Omnissiah by negligent misservice' has been trampled!" {n}His wail turns into an angry, stifled wheeze:{/n} "What scoundrel was it that thought to burn sacred unguents instead of incense?"

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的面甲充斥着深红色的光芒，音阵装置爆发出了痛苦、愤怒的嚎叫。{/n}“检测到异端亵渎恶行！上述亵渎行为源自固步自封的教外人士愚蠢的头脑！‘禁止虚假的先知触及欧姆尼塞亚的奥秘’，这条戒律遭到了违背！‘禁止以疏忽恶行冒犯欧姆尼塞亚’，这条戒律遭到了践踏！”{n}他的哀嚎变成了愤怒的呼哧声，上气不接下气。{/n}“究竟是哪个恶棍，觉得应该焚烧的不是熏香，而是神圣机油？”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's optical visor fills with deep red, and his vox-speaker erupts into a howl of pained fury:{/n} "I am registering heretical sacrilege born from the stupidity of self-entitled laity! The commandment 'Allow not a false prophet to touch upon the mysteries of the Omnissiah' has been violated! The commandment 'Offend not the Omnissiah by negligent misservice' has been trampled!" {n}His wail turns into an angry, stifled wheeze:{/n} "What scoundrel was it that thought to burn sacred unguents instead of incense?"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的面甲充斥着深红色的光芒，音阵装置爆发出了痛苦、愤怒的嚎叫。{/n}“检测到异端亵渎恶行！上述亵渎行为源自固步自封的教外人士愚蠢的头脑！‘禁止虚假的先知触及欧姆尼塞亚的奥秘’，这条戒律遭到了违背！‘禁止以疏忽恶行冒犯欧姆尼塞亚’，这条戒律遭到了践踏！”{n}他的哀嚎变成了愤怒的呼哧声，上气不接下气。{/n}“究竟是哪个恶棍，觉得应该焚烧的不是熏香，而是神圣机油？”

languages.text: {n}パスカルの光学バイザーが深紅に染まり、彼のヴォックス・スピーカーが怒りと苦痛に満ちた咆哮を轟かせた。{/n}「自分は今、思い上がった俗人どもの愚かしさから生まれた異端の冒涜を感知している！『偽りの預言者に万機神の神秘へ触れさせるな』という戒律が破られた！『怠慢な奉仕で万機神を冒涜するな』という戒律が踏みにじられたのだ！」{n}彼の咆哮は、怒りに満ちた押し殺した喘ぎへと変わった。{/n}「誰だ、香を焚くべきところで聖なる軟膏を燃やそうなどと考えた不届き者は！？」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's optical visor fills with deep red, and his vox-speaker erupts into a howl of pained fury:{/n} "I am registering heretical sacrilege born from the stupidity of self-entitled laity! The commandment 'Allow not a false prophet to touch upon the mysteries of the Omnissiah' has been violated! The commandment 'Offend not the Omnissiah by negligent misservice' has been trampled!" {n}His wail turns into an angry, stifled wheeze:{/n} "What scoundrel was it that thought to burn sacred unguents instead of incense?"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの光学バイザーが深紅に染まり、彼のヴォックス・スピーカーが怒りと苦痛に満ちた咆哮を轟かせた。{/n}「自分は今、思い上がった俗人どもの愚かしさから生まれた異端の冒涜を感知している！『偽りの預言者に万機神の神秘へ触れさせるな』という戒律が破られた！『怠慢な奉仕で万機神を冒涜するな』という戒律が踏みにじられたのだ！」{n}彼の咆哮は、怒りに満ちた押し殺した喘ぎへと変わった。{/n}「誰だ、香を焚くべきところで聖なる軟膏を燃やそうなどと考えた不届き者は！？」

languages.text: {n}El visor óptico de Pasqal se ilumina con un intenso color rojo, y su altavoz profiere un alarido de furia:{/n} «¡Detecto un sacrilegio herético nacido de la estupidez del laicismo! ¡Se ha quebrantado el mandamiento “No permitirás que un falso profeta interprete los misterios del Omnissiah”! ¡Se ha pisoteado el mandamiento “No ofenderás al Omnissiah con un servicio negligente”!». {n}Su lamento se convierte en un bufido apenas contenido:{/n} «¿Quién ha sido el rufián que ha tenido la infeliz idea de quemar ungüentos sagrados en vez de incienso?».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's optical visor fills with deep red, and his vox-speaker erupts into a howl of pained fury:{/n} "I am registering heretical sacrilege born from the stupidity of self-entitled laity! The commandment 'Allow not a false prophet to touch upon the mysteries of the Omnissiah' has been violated! The commandment 'Offend not the Omnissiah by negligent misservice' has been trampled!" {n}His wail turns into an angry, stifled wheeze:{/n} "What scoundrel was it that thought to burn sacred unguents instead of incense?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El visor óptico de Pasqal se ilumina con un intenso color rojo, y su altavoz profiere un alarido de furia:{/n} «¡Detecto un sacrilegio herético nacido de la estupidez del laicismo! ¡Se ha quebrantado el mandamiento “No permitirás que un falso profeta interprete los misterios del Omnissiah”! ¡Se ha pisoteado el mandamiento “No ofenderás al Omnissiah con un servicio negligente”!». {n}Su lamento se convierte en un bufido apenas contenido:{/n} «¿Quién ha sido el rufián que ha tenido la infeliz idea de quemar ungüentos sagrados en vez de incienso?».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın optik vizörü, koyu kırmızıya dönüyor. Voks hoparlöründen acı bir öfke uğultusu çıkıyor.{/n} "Kendini beğenmiş avamın aptallığından doğan kâfirce bir saygısızlık tespit edildi! 'Sahte peygamberin Hermesih'in gizemlerine dokunmasına müsaade etme' emri ihlal edildi! 'İhmalkâr hizmetle Hermesih'i gücendirme' emri çiğnendi!" {n}Bu uğultu daha öfkeli, boğuk bir hırıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Tütsü yerine kutsal özyağları yakma fikrini hangi alçak öne sürdü?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's optical visor fills with deep red, and his vox-speaker erupts into a howl of pained fury:{/n} "I am registering heretical sacrilege born from the stupidity of self-entitled laity! The commandment 'Allow not a false prophet to touch upon the mysteries of the Omnissiah' has been violated! The commandment 'Offend not the Omnissiah by negligent misservice' has been trampled!" {n}His wail turns into an angry, stifled wheeze:{/n} "What scoundrel was it that thought to burn sacred unguents instead of incense?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın optik vizörü, koyu kırmızıya dönüyor. Voks hoparlöründen acı bir öfke uğultusu çıkıyor.{/n} "Kendini beğenmiş avamın aptallığından doğan kâfirce bir saygısızlık tespit edildi! 'Sahte peygamberin Hermesih'in gizemlerine dokunmasına müsaade etme' emri ihlal edildi! 'İhmalkâr hizmetle Hermesih'i gücendirme' emri çiğnendi!" {n}Bu uğultu daha öfkeli, boğuk bir hırıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Tütsü yerine kutsal özyağları yakma fikrini hangi alçak öne sürdü?"

languages.text: {n}Le viseur optique de Pasqal s'emplit de rouge et son synthétiseur-vox crache un hurlement de rage :{/n} « Détection d'un sacrilège hérétique né d'une stupidité profane imbue d'elle-même ! Le commandement "Ne laisse point un faux prophète souiller les mystères de l'Omnimessie" a été enfreint ! Le commandement "N'offense point l'Omnimessie par la négligence dans tes devoirs" a été foulé aux pieds ! {n}Son cri se mue en un sifflement furieux et étouffé.{/n} Quel misérable a eu l'idée de brûler des onguents sacrés au lieu d'encens ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's optical visor fills with deep red, and his vox-speaker erupts into a howl of pained fury:{/n} "I am registering heretical sacrilege born from the stupidity of self-entitled laity! The commandment 'Allow not a false prophet to touch upon the mysteries of the Omnissiah' has been violated! The commandment 'Offend not the Omnissiah by negligent misservice' has been trampled!" {n}His wail turns into an angry, stifled wheeze:{/n} "What scoundrel was it that thought to burn sacred unguents instead of incense?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le viseur optique de Pasqal s'emplit de rouge et son synthétiseur-vox crache un hurlement de rage :{/n} « Détection d'un sacrilège hérétique né d'une stupidité profane imbue d'elle-même ! Le commandement "Ne laisse point un faux prophète souiller les mystères de l'Omnimessie" a été enfreint ! Le commandement "N'offense point l'Omnimessie par la négligence dans tes devoirs" a été foulé aux pieds ! {n}Son cri se mue en un sifflement furieux et étouffé.{/n} Quel misérable a eu l'idée de brûler des onguents sacrés au lieu d'encens ? »

languages.text: {n}Pasqals optischer Visor färbt sich tiefrot und die Stimme aus seinem Vox-Lautsprecher gleicht einem gequälten Heulen:{/n} "Ich registriere ein ketzerisches Sakrileg basierend auf der Dummheit selbsternannter Laien! Das Gebot 'Kein falscher Prophet darf um die Geheimnisse des Omnissiah wissen' wurde verletzt! Das Gebot 'Beleidige den Omnissiah nicht durch schlechte Dienste' wurde mit Füßen getreten!" {n}Sein Jammern geht in ein wütendes, ersticktes Keuchen über:{/n} "Welcher Tunichtgut kam auf die Idee, anstelle von Weihrauch heilige Salben zu verbrennen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's optical visor fills with deep red, and his vox-speaker erupts into a howl of pained fury:{/n} "I am registering heretical sacrilege born from the stupidity of self-entitled laity! The commandment 'Allow not a false prophet to touch upon the mysteries of the Omnissiah' has been violated! The commandment 'Offend not the Omnissiah by negligent misservice' has been trampled!" {n}His wail turns into an angry, stifled wheeze:{/n} "What scoundrel was it that thought to burn sacred unguents instead of incense?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals optischer Visor färbt sich tiefrot und die Stimme aus seinem Vox-Lautsprecher gleicht einem gequälten Heulen:{/n} "Ich registriere ein ketzerisches Sakrileg basierend auf der Dummheit selbsternannter Laien! Das Gebot 'Kein falscher Prophet darf um die Geheimnisse des Omnissiah wissen' wurde verletzt! Das Gebot 'Beleidige den Omnissiah nicht durch schlechte Dienste' wurde mit Füßen getreten!" {n}Sein Jammern geht in ein wütendes, ersticktes Keuchen über:{/n} "Welcher Tunichtgut kam auf die Idee, anstelle von Weihrauch heilige Salben zu verbrennen?"
